alert.note: Alert for Kinney; Maverick (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 12 at 7:39PM CDT until May 12 at 8:15PM CDT by NWS Austin-San Antonio
info.description: The National Weather Service in Austin San Antonio has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Western Kinney County in south central Texas... Northwestern Maverick County in south central Texas... * Until 815 PM CDT. * At 739 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Brackettville, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Locations impacted include... Brackettville, Spofford, Standart, Amanda, Fort Clark Springs and Laughlin AFB Aux Field. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
